queries.name: getImports
queries.query:
query MyQuery {
  import_control(order_by: {control_id: desc}) {
    control_id
    changes_found
    start_time
    stop_time
    successful_import
    is_initial_import
    last_change_in_config
    mgm_id
    import_errors
  }
  config
}

queries.name: getImportConfig
